Welcome to our beginners learn page. Here you can find material, links and articles to start you R journey.

## R Introduction

An introduction to R with hands on examples and exercises can be found in [Introduction to R](https://nickhaf.github.io/r_tutorial/).

There is also this [Cheat Sheet: Base R](https://iqss.github.io/dss-workshops/R/Rintro/base-r-cheat-sheet.pdf) to get an Overview for all basic functions in R.
